410         """
411         query = f"""
412         WITH event_stats AS (
413             SELECT
414                 COUNT(*) as total_events,
415                 SUM(CASE WHEN impact >= 0.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as meaningful_events,
416                 SUM(CASE WHEN impact >= 0.9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as high_impact_events
417             FROM {events_table}
418             WHERE timestamp >= current_timestamp() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR
419         ),
420         cost_stats AS (
421             SELECT
422                 SUM(usage_quantity) as total_dbu
423             FROM system.billing.usage
424             WHERE usage_date = current_date()
425         )
426         SELECT
427             e.total_events,
428             e.meaningful_events,
429             e.high_impact_events,
430             c.total_dbu,
431             CASE WHEN e.total_events > 0
432                  THEN c.total_dbu / e.total_events
433                  ELSE 0
434             END as dbu_per_event,
435             CASE WHEN e.meaningful_events > 0
436                  THEN c.total_dbu / e.meaningful_events
437                  ELSE 0
438             END as dbu_per_meaningful_event,
439             CASE WHEN e.total_events > 0
440                  THEN CAST(e.meaningful_events AS FLOAT) / e.total_events
441                  ELSE 0
442             END as efficiency_ratio
443         FROM event_stats e
444         CROSS JOIN cost_stats c
445         """
446         return await self.execute_sql(query)
results.issue_text: Possible SQL injection vector through string-based query construction.
